alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:31AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Union, Tippah, eastern Benton, west central Tishomingo, northern Prentiss, Alcorn, southern Hardeman and southern McNairy Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 831 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Selmer to near Canaan. Movement was south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, New Albany, Ripley, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Adamsville, Burnsville, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Glen, Thrashers, Keownville, Theo, Canaan, Pocahontas, Hinkle, Leedy, Gravestown and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
